title: Xinxiang Sushijie - Vegetarian World
description: Name 心香素食界. Teahouse and vegetarian restaurant. Serves the typical Sichuan cuisine. Staff does not speak English, but a photo menu is available. Serves soups, salads, desserts, tea, juices, beer and non-alcoholic beer. Located on Linjiang Middle Rd directly across River from Sofitel Hotel and midway between Huaxiba and Jinjiang Hotel Metro stops.
